channel.title: ML on Ameya Godbole
channel.description: Recent content in ML on Ameya Godbole

item.title: Progressively Balanced Multi-class Neural Trees
item.description: Mentor: Dr. Prithwijit Guha (Dept. of EEE, IIT Guwahati) Collaborator: Spoorthy Bhat This project was my Bachelor’s thesis at IIT Guwahati. The basic idea is to allow each node to learn oblique partitions in the input space as opposed to the axis-aligned partitions learned by a standard C4.5 tree. This required the development of a differentiable criterion. During the course of the project we realized that this hierarchical partitioning results in data-thinning (i.

item.title: DEep Semantic Kernel (DESK)
item.description: Mentors: Dr. Amit Sethi (Dept. of EEE, IIT Bombay), Neeraj K. Vaid Collaborator: Aman Dalmia We attempted transfer learning between a convolutional neural network (CNN) in the source domain and maximum margin classifiers in the low-data target domain. Our goal was to leverage the capabilities of the CNN trained on large amounts of training data, especially in image classification tasks, in other tasks with limited data. The project ongoing at Dr.
